Basically just Half-Life Deathmatch but in Source, and also with a lot of HL:S's glitches and strange visual oddities. Although it looks slightly better, and has ragdolls, I'd say to just stick with classic GoldSrc Half-Life's deathmatch as although these are neat improvements, the better lighting and water effects just kinda've clash with the artstyle HL1 has going for it. If you really want to play HL Deathmatch but with better graphics then just go with Black Mesa. Also like HL2: Deathmatch, I have no idea why they made Deathmatch a seperate game when in the original HL1 it was built into the main game. At least Deathmatch Source comes with HL:S for free so I can't really complain there.
